posts.author: PiratePatriotParrot
posts.title: Every UK household this morning now that the Online Safety Act has come into effect

posts.author: SuperHonkey
posts.title: Fatigue²

twitter.content: We shouldn’t have to live like this.

posts.raw_content:
You can create a fake profile or just state things in a neutral tone. I live in an area where some neighborhoods are easily a quarter illegals. Hispanic illegal immigrants don't use discord or blue SKY. That's cringe leftist Redditor stuff. They use Facebook. 

I screw with them by posting false ICE sightings on the community FB page. It's the funniest s*** ever. They freak out and scatter from entire streets.  My buddy introduced this trolling concept to me. I originally thought it was just a joke Boomer Cons would promote to themselves, but she shops at the gas stations in this community and she knows Spanish fluently so she's confirmed any activity reported on FB affects the local economy. 

You can also search county arrest records to find the few being held for detention due to immigration status. One post a week makes them catastrophize. Based on my limited experience 90% of county arrests are DUIs, petty theft or aggravated violence so to casual FB users they get to see illegal immigrants try to defend the actions of real nuisances just because they're also illegal immigrants. It's really gross but I'm hoping soccer moms are being educated in the process. 

I'm sick of these people completely destroying my town. They've robbed us blind having to support their kids with ESL funding.  My grandfather had to wait 2 hours because the waiting room was filled with noncitizens. I'm getting just a little bit of enjoyment watching them freak out every weekend when I have time to post. Yeah it's petty online nonsense but I'm easily entertained. 

If I get really bored maybe one day I'll stand in the shopping strip, share an ICE sighting and record it. There's an idea for anyone wanting to start an online career. Try it.
